passages.title: Section 1: Conversation about a Library
passages.transcript:
Librarian: Good morning, Northside Library. How can I help you?
Student: Hello, I'd like to join the library, please.
Librarian: Certainly. Are you a student?
Student: Yes, I am.
Librarian: Okay, I'll need some details. What's your full name?
Student: It's Sarah Jones.
Librarian: And your address?
Student: 123 Main Street.
Librarian: Do you have a contact number?
Student: Yes, it's 07700 900123.
Librarian: Great. Now, for students, the membership is free, but we charge a small fee for lost books.
Student: That's fine.

passages.title: Section 2: Tour Guide Speech
passages.transcript: Guide: Welcome everyone to the City Museum. We have a lot of interesting exhibits for you today. On the ground floor, you'll find the history of the city, from its founding to the present day. The first floor is dedicated to natural history, with fossils and dinosaur skeletons. On the second floor, we have an art gallery featuring local artists. The museum is open from 9 am to 5 pm every day. Please feel free to ask me any questions.

questions.question: Match the floor to the exhibit.
questions.instruction:
A. Art Gallery
B. History of the City
C. Natural History
